changeSet.author: ir73
changeSet.sql: insert into connection_type (id, name, bundle_class, connection_properties_schema) values (11, 'BigQuery', 'com.fbi.engine.query.factory.impl.BigqueryFlairFactory', '{ "connectionDetailsType": "BigQuery", "config": {"disableUsername": true, "disablePassword": true}, "imagePath": "#bigquery", "connectionDetailsClass": "com.fbi.engine.domain.details.BigqueryConnectionDetails", "connectionProperties":[ { "displayName": "Dataset", "fieldName": "dataset", "order": 1, "fieldType": "String", "defaultValue": "dataset", "required": true }, { "displayName": "Project ID", "fieldName": "projectId", "order": 2, "fieldType": "String", "required": true }, { "displayName": "Email", "fieldName": "email", "order": 3, "fieldType": "String", "required": true }, { "displayName": "JSON contents", "fieldName": "privateKey", "order": 4, "fieldType": "Text", "required": true }] }');
